Title: Use Your Disillusion
Plot: Dawson takes Joey up on her invitation for a weekend in Boston, but the two have reservations once there. Meanwhile, Jack is surprised when his boyfriend Tobey shows up unexpectedly forcing Jack to choose between fraternity hell week and spending time with Tobey.
GuestStars: Jonathan Parks Jordan, Bourke Floyd, Melissa Claire Egan, Janie Brookshire, Pam Hurley
